Package serverSide.sharedRegions

Class Kitchen

  • java.lang.Object
    • serverSide.sharedRegions.Kitchen
  • public class Kitchen
extends Object
    Kitchen It is responsible for the the synchronization of the Chef and Waiter is implemented as an implicit monitor. There is one internal synchronization points: a single blocking point for the Chef, where he waits for the Waiter to signal
